name: generator-typescript-npm
description: Yeoman generator for TypeScript modules, using only npm scripts instead of Grunt/Gulp

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run updatetemplate && npm run copytemplate
scripts.copytemplate: shx mkdir -p ./generators && shx cp -R src/templates generators
scripts.updatetemplate: shx rm -rf src/templates && mkdir src/templates && git clone https://github.com/mathiasringhof/typescript-node-seed src/templates && shx rm -rf src/templates/.git && shx rm src/templates/README.md

author: Mathias Ringhof
